oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "'Hallelujah!' -- Memphis Movie Musical of 1928"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Hallelujah!"; film; Vidor, King; African Americans; newspapers;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: News article from the "Daily News" that describes the film "Hallelujah!". It was the first sound film with an all-black cast as well as the first film to use post-synchronized sound. 3 pages.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Donated by Rubye Woodruff Carter; Manuscript collection processed by Heather Tankersley;
